content.text: table is designed to store detailed records of payment transactions related to utility services. It appears to be part of an archival system, capturing historical payment data for utility accounts. The table includes information about the utility company, billing periods, account details, payment amounts, and various financial metrics. It also tracks metadata such as the user who authenticated the transaction and timestamps for when records were added or last updated.
The complexity of this table is considered medium due to the following factors:
It contains a significant number of columns (34), which increases the complexity of managing and querying the data.
The presence of multiple financial fields with default values and user-defined functions for defaults adds complexity.
The table does not explicitly define primary or foreign keys, which could complicate relationships and data integrity management.
